trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of TableMapping objects, and is implemented by the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection"></xref>, which is used in common by .NET Framework data providers.
The <xref:System.Data.ITableMappingCollection> interface allows an inheriting class to implement a TableMapping collection.
For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md).

An application does not create an instance of the <xref:System.Data.ITableMappingCollection> interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits <xref:System.Data.ITableMappingCollection>.
Classes that inherit <xref:System.Data.ITableMappingCollection> must implement the inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality.
For example, the <xref:System.Data.ITableMappingCollection> interface defines one implementation of the <xref:System.Data.ITableMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
In turn, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> class inherits this method, and defines two additional overloads of <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>.
Adds a table mapping to the collection.
The case-sensitive name of the source table.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table.
A reference to the newly-mapped <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> object.
Gets a value indicating whether the collection contains a table mapping with the specified source table name.
The case-sensitive name of the source table.
`true` if a table mapping with the specified source table name exists, otherwise `false`.
Gets the TableMapping object with the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table name.
The name of the `DataSet` table within the collection.
The TableMapping object with the specified `DataSet` table name.
Gets the location of the <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> object within the collection.
The case-sensitive name of the source table.
The zero-based location of the <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> object within the collection.
Gets or sets the instance of <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping.SourceTable"></xref> name.
The `SourceTable` name of the <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref>.
The instance of <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> with the specified `SourceTable` name.
Removes the <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> object with the specified <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping.SourceTable"></xref> name from the collection.
The case-sensitive name of the `SourceTable`.
